get.description:
This resource describes the properties associated with a timestamp.
TimeStamp is a string that captures the timestamp using the RFC3339 datetime format (e.g: 2007-04-05T14:30Z) (Time+Date+Timezone)
Retrieves the current timestamp data.

timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formated time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00)

precision.description: Accuracy granularity of the exposed value

value.description: The value sensed or actuated by this Resource

range.description: The valid range for the value Property

step.description: Step value across the defined range

id.description: Instance ID of this specific resource

if.description: The interface set supported by this resource
